dcterms:creator: R. F. Guerreiro
P. M. Aguiar
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 155 sequences with 2 or 3 objects each, used for motion segmentation experiments. The authors added missing data uniformly at random to evaluate their method's performance.
dcterms:title: Hopkins 155 Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used for motion capture experiments, where several sensors capture the motion of a human performing various activities. The authors generated missing data uniformly at random for their experiments.
dcterms:title: CMU Mocap Dataset

dcterms:description: Synthetic data generated for experiments to evaluate the proposed method's performance in reconstructing and clustering incomplete data.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Data
